hexical.page.disguise_mage_block.summary: Sets this mage blocks appearance and shape to match the block described by the given identifier, but without any of its unique $(l:patterns/scrying/blocks#hexpose:get_blockstates)$(action)Facets/$.
hexical.page.tweak_mage_block.summary: for now, this spell is just a copy of $(l:patterns/spells/mage_blocks#hexical:disguise_mage_block)$(action)Disguise Mage Block/$.
